With a star-studded cast including Robert De Niro, Jodie Foster, and Martin Scorsese himself, it's a must-see film that will keep you engaged from start to finish.

Alternatively, if you're in the mood for something more recent, "Gangs of New York" might be up your alley. Directed by Martin Scorsese, this visually stunning epic brings 19th-century New York City to life with memorable performances from Leonardo DiCaprio, Daniel Day-Lewis, and Cameron Diaz.
